name: wonder-skin

effect.x_y: Non-damaging moves have exactly 50% base accuracy against this Pokémon.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Non-damaging moves have exactly 50% base accuracy against this Pokémon.

short_effect: Lowers incoming non-damaging moves' base accuracy to exactly 50%.

flavor_text.x_y: Makes status moves more likely to miss.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Makes status moves more likely to miss.
